bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Great Western Scenic Trail, a system of trails to accommodate a variety of travel users in a corridor extending from the Arizona-Mexico border to the Idaho-Montana-Canada border, for study for addition to the national scenic trails system. Permits motorized vehicles on components of the Great Western Scenic Trail system.
